main event: A sighting of an unidentified aerial object was reported on 10/13/53 in Forrest City, Arkansas. The object hovered over the city for about 32 to 45 minutes, was silver colored, very bright, almost round, and made no sound. It had no visible means of propulsion, left no vapor trail, and traveled slowly.
interesting points: The object appeared from the northwest, hovered over the city for an extended period, and then departed towards the south.
The sighting was observed for a duration of between thirty to forty-five minutes.
The object was described as silver colored, very bright, and almost round with no visible means of propulsion.
Multiple observers, including a member of the Forrest City Police Department and others, saw the object directly over the city.
The reliability of the witnesses was not determinable.
witnesses: Multiple observers including a member of the Forrest City Police Department and others
